ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the people of Ibrahim and the people of Lut
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the people of Abraham and Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and so too did the people of Abraham and the people of Lot;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the people of Abraham, Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And (so did) the people of Ibrahim and the people of Lut.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the people of Ibrahim and the people of Lut,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the people of Ibrahim and the people of Lut,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the people of Abraham, the people of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the folk of Abraham and the folk of Lot;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So did the people of Abraham and the people of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the people of Ibrahim and the people of Lut.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [as well as] the people of Abraham and the people of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the people of Ibrahim (Abraham) and the people of Lout (Lot),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the nation of Abraham and the nation of Lot;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the people of Abraham, and the people of Lot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:43] as well as the people of Abraham, and the people of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the folk of Abraham) denied Abraham (and the folk of Lot) denied Lot;
